full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement**

## **Title and Reference**
W3028-23JR05 Information Management Contractor
Reference Number: WS4042477552-Doc4063628957
Solicitation Number: WS4042477552

## **Tender Details**

* **Start Date**: N/A
* **Closing Date**: Friday, July 20th, 2023 - 14:00 EDT
* **Contract Duration**: 1 year (firm) with 2 option years
* **Contract Location**: Canadian Forces Base Kingston, Ontario

## **Scope of Work**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a contractor to provide information management services to support the Canadian Forces Joint Signal Regiment (CFJSR). The contractor will provide a specialist in information/records management/recordkeeping to support IM requirements at the CFJSR. Services are to be provided on-site at the CFJSR E-37 building.

## **Security Requirements**

The contractor's personnel must have a valid security clearance of SECRET and Controlled Goods certificate for the duration of the contract.

## **Travel**

Canada will not accept any travel and living expenses incurred by the contractor as a result of any relocation of personnel required to satisfy the terms of the contract.

## **Contact Information**

For more information, please contact the following:

* **Contact Name**: Vashti Ramnarine
* **Contact Email**: [vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 289-772-7284

## **Additional Information**

* **UNSPSC Classification**: Information Technology IT Management Services, Management Information Systems, Information Retrieval or Search Software Maintenance, Information Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others.
* **Government Portal**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16641164?extsite=MTY2NDExNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16641164?extsite=MTY2NDExNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5
